title: Rogers ISP issues?
body: So im playing in Canada (Ottawa) to be more exact and randomly this past week and maybe even the one before.. my ping was staying at 19-26 and is now fluctuating between 39-48 to 70-100. I called rogers and they said it might be routing problems. However seems to always be some issue so if possible can i get some help.... I have no idea why im paying so much for net but can't play a simple game without experiencing very high ping fluctuation. {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
same here, with rogers used to have consist <30 ping but now have 50+ and sometimes 100+ for a couple weeks now. lots of jitter too

50-60 ping is fine but i play with 10-20 ping difference everyday and occasional 100 ping spike so its quite noticeable and annoying

From the way our players speak, it doesn't sound too uncommon for Roger's to have these kinds of issue. If you want you could run a traceroute to our servers at 104.160.131.1 using something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/), and that data could help Rogers figure out what's going wrong with their routing.
